title: Priority Queue - Red Please Read.
body:
Yesterday I was issued with a priority queue of 5 games at a 10 minute wait for each for AFKing one game, fair enough.

But just then I've been issued with 5 games at 20 minute waits for my champion select freezing, so before the game got in I held the power button to my computer so it instantly turned off but the game went ahead and I didn't rejoin until around the 9th minute. So I don't know if this is fair in honesty. As soon as I joined I play the full game and didn't AFK at all. I really don't wanna do 5 20 minute queues for something out of my control. If it was on my own accord AFKing like my previous priority queue by all means I'd deserve it.

Can anything can be done about this or am I just going to have to cop it sweet, which I probably will because riot does nothing to help anyone. haha laters

replies.body:
Thing about Leavebuster is that it will *never* give you an LPQ for one game, that's not how it works. In fact first game you leave is just a pop-up reminding you that leaving is bad, the one you need to type "I agree" for. Getting an LPQ for two games is rare, at best. Usually takes 3-7 leaves to be hit with a 5 minute LPQ, depending on how often it occurs. After that it would take just one leave to get hit with the next level (10 minute and 20 minute), but without those first few leaves it wont happen.

Thing is, you definitely would've had to leave more than 1 game to end up in your current situation, and the fact you've admitted to intentionally leaving games just means it's more than fair that this is happening. After all, why should dozens (if not hundreds) of other players suffer because of your choices or because you don't have a stable enough connection?

That was the first game i've intentionally AFKed in half a year or so. I only just started playing after not playing for a couple of months last week & that is the first time i've been mad enough to AFK. 

It's not an unstable connection, my computer froze for the first time since purchase & there was nothing I could do in my reach because as I restarted it, it decided to do it's own updates.

Just going to cop it sweet and hope I don't get banned if it happens again lel
This happened to me yesterday, I unintentionally DC'd my first ranked game ever in 3 years and was issued with 5 , 20 minute low priority

_"Suspensions due to the Leaver Buster System and Tribunal will not be lifted or shortened under any circumstances."_

Nothing you or any Rioter here can do. Source [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201898070-My-Account-is-Suspended#h1q2).

The best course of action moving forwards is to understand how the LeaverBuster system works. It goes off percentage games, if your AFK percentage is high, you will get a ban for any AFK longer than 4 minutes. 

Good thing is that **bot games** count towards this percentage, so maybe spam a few bot games a day to bring your percentage down. Also I heard if you AFK in a bot game the punishment is less than a PVP game, no creditable source on that though.
